programme.desc: Two men. Living on the exact opposite side of the world. When one sleeps, the other one is awake. But when they finally meet, a simple question arises: Who is the dream and who is the dreamer?

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: A man with the ability to enter people's memories takes on the case of a brilliant, troubled sixteen-year-old girl to determine whether she is a sociopath or a victim of trauma.

programme.title: Point B
programme.desc: Four friends and Graduate students in the physics department of their University discover their clean energy machine actually works as a crude, rudimentary teleportation device. Through experimentation, adjustments and some misuse-use of the device, it is quickly discovered that the machine holds many consequences.

programme.title: Terrifier 2
programme.desc: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to Miles County where he begins to target a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween.

programme.title: V/H/S 2
programme.desc: Mysterious VHS tapes with horrific contents are found in a missing student's abandoned house.

programme.title: V/H/S: Viral
programme.desc: Teens waiting to catch the next viral video. However, they must face their own deaths in the next video.

programme.title: 2036 Origin Unknown
programme.desc: After a deadly crash, mission controller Mackenzie Wilson assists an artificial intelligence system, A.R.T.I., to uncover a mysterious object under the surface of Mars that could change the future of Earth.

programme.title: The Lingering
programme.desc: When Dawa was a child, he and his mother were tormented by a strange presence in their house causing them to spend a fearful night hiding in the basement. Years later, after his motherâ€™s death, Dawa is forced to return, once again facing the presence that once tortured him as a child. Is it a ghost or is there something more earthly to explain the strange occurrences?

programme.title: Siren
programme.desc: Leigh has a unique power: every man who encounters her sees his ultimate fantasy, and falls uncontrollably in love with her.

programme.title: Ever After (Endzeit)
programme.desc: Post-apocalypse Europe, two years after zombies have overrun Earth, only two citadels of civilization remain: Weimar and Jena. Vivi and Eva flee Weimar in search of a brighter future in Jena. Stranded in the no-mans land of the Black Forest, Vivi and Eva have to rely on each other and nature in order to survive. But their survival has also unleashed demons from their past that they must confront.

programme.title: Radius
programme.desc: Following a car crash, a man wakes with no memory. As he seeks help, he discovers only dead bodies. He soon discovers the horrible truth; any living thing that comes within a 50-foot radius of him dies instantly.

programme.title: Shark Season
programme.desc: A great white shark relentlessly stalks three kayakers out on a remote island. As they wait for help to arrive, the tide starts to rise, forcing them back into the deadly waters. Now the race is on as shark threatens to pick them off on the way back to the mainland.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Kolossus
programme.desc: When a new Mega Shark appears, it threatens the global economy. Scared of being left behind, Russia accidentally reawakens the Kolossus, a giant automaton doomsday device built during the Cold War, in its search for new energy. Now the world must figure out how to stop the two deadly creatures before they destroy everything on sea AND land.
